title: Nicastore
desc: Nicastore is a Thrift Store Website that I made for school project. I'm using Reactjs TailwindCSS and MaterialUI for this website. And MongoDB for the database.

title: VIPP Hotel
desc: VIPP Hotel is a website I made using Reactjs and TailwindCSS. I made this website when learn how to slicing design to website. (Desktop view recomended)

title: 4Anthem
desc: This is a website that I made for a band named 4Anthem. I made this website using ReactJS and CSS and Axios for fetching the API.

title: DigiCard
desc: DigiCard is a website that I made whem i'm still learning how to fetch API to ReactJS using AXIOS. The website offer many digimon characters. (Desktop view recomended)

title: AnuGamingStore
desc: This website I made using ReactJS and TailwindCSS. I made this website to help me learn how to slice design into website. (Desktop view recomended)
